tool_description:
Find Calories and KiloJoules in specific food name,
You can build amazing apps using this api
name: Food Calories
title: Food Calories

api_list.name: sorted by calories
api_list.description: get foods list sorted by calories value
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://food-calories1.p.rapidapi.com/foods/sorted-by-cals"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "food-calories1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get food by name
api_list.description: get food object by sending its name as parameter
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://food-calories1.p.rapidapi.com/foods/Applesauce"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "food-calories1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://food-calories1.p.rapidapi.com/foods/{food_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "food-calories1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get foods by category name
api_list.description: simply you can send category name and get all foods in this category
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://food-calories1.p.rapidapi.com/categories/Pork/foods"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "food-calories1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
